meta.title: NouVet | Invitation
expired.heading: Was the invite bitten?
expired.description: Seems like the invite is a little brokey. But that's alright! Just ask your partner to share with you a new invite!
accept-invite.heading: Join {{inviterName}}
accept-invite.description: By joining the family, you will be able to see all the pets of the inviter. Your pets will only be visible to you, unless set otherwise.
acceptInvite.failed: Something, somewhere, didn't work as expected. Maybe the invite has expired? We will look into it, but please, try again later.
